channel.title: Soup on Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Soup on Recipes

item.title: 30-Minute Black Bean Soup Recipe
item.description: Notes: Pretty good, though I barely followed the recipe. Added carrot, puree’d at the end

item.title: Best Lentil Soup
item.description: Notes: no joke. Also, I think doubling would just barely fit in the biggest pot.

item.title: Black Eyed Pea, Paprika, and Kale Soup
item.description: Notes: Added tomato paste and tomato broth, smoked salt. Could not taste when I made this so we’ll see

item.title: Creamy Roasted Cauliflower Soup Recipe \- Cookie and Kate
item.description: Notes: Souuuup. Simple but takes an hour +.

item.title: Gazpacho in blender (canal house cooking pp. 34\)
Italian white bean potato kale soup
Spicy Black Bean Soup
item.description: Notes: cut the spice for Rosa, ½ jalepeño, 1ts chipotle. Also, I don’t think we should soak the beans. I bet we could add a little celery and it would be great.

item.title: Vegetarian matzo ball soup
item.description: Notes: matzo balls were good, made enough for five people. Melody thought the soup was too sweet.

item.title: Winter squash soup with gruyere croutons – smitten kitchen
item.description: Notes: Made with butternut only, turned out great
